tool_description: Determines specific nutritional requirements based on pet species, breed, life stage, activity level, and health conditions.

species.description: Pet species: dog, cat, rabbit, bird, or ferret

life_stage.description: Life stage: puppy, kitten, adult, senior, or pregnant

activity_level.description: Activity level: low, moderate, high, or working

health_conditions.description: List of health conditions affecting nutrition

spayed_neutered.description: Whether pet is spayed or neutered

error_messages: Unsupported species: Use one of [dog, cat, rabbit, bird, ferret]
Invalid life stage: Use one of [puppy, kitten, adult, senior, pregnant]
Invalid activity level: Use one of [low, moderate, high, working]
Invalid weight: Weight must be a positive number between 0.1 and 100 kg
Unknown health condition: Ensure health conditions are recognized nutritional concerns
usage: Specify species, life_stage, weight_kg, and activity_level. Optionally include breed, health_conditions, and spayed_neutered status. Returns species-specific nutritional requirements.
